key.name: active
key.description: Whether this plugin would be activated by gnome-settings-daemon or not

key.name: priority
key.summary: Priority to use for this plugin
key.description: Priority to use for this plugin in gnome-settings-daemon startup queue

key.name: current-picture
key.description: Current picture being rendered on the screen

key.name: draw-mode
key.summary: how the background is drawed on the screen
key.description: enumerations represent how the background is drawed on the screen. e.g. scaling or tiling

key.name: picture-uris
key.description: Background image URIs delimited by semicolons. Note that the backend only supports local (file://) URIs.

key.name: cross-fade-auto-mode
key.summary: How pictures are chosen to draw
key.description: enumerations represent how pictures are chose to drawn. e.g. in random or in sequence

key.name: background-duration
key.description: The unit is second, if less or equal to zero, do not change the background; if more than 0, change the background after background-duration time

key.name: cross-fade-manual-interval
key.description: The unit is millisecond, two backgrounds switching duration

key.name: cross-fade-auto-interval
key.summary: Auto change background animation two frames duration
key.description: The unit is millisecond, change background animation two frames duration
